item.title: Bangalore to Tiruttani Solo Travel Plan
item.description: Tiruttani is a significant pilgrimage destination in Tamil Nadu, known for its ancient temple dedicated to Lord Murugan. As a solo traveler, you'll have the opportunity to immerse yourself in the spiritual ambiance of the temple town, explore its cultural heritage, and witness the rituals and traditions firsthand. Here's a suggested solo travel plan: Arrival in Tiruttani Depart from Ba
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
